data.text: Enti saa mmarima baasa yi ammua Hiob bio, efisɛ na ɔteɛ wɔ ɔno ara ani so.
Na Busini Barakel babarima Elihu a ofi Ram abusua mu no bo fuw Hiob yiye sɛ obu ne ho bem na ommu Onyankopɔn mmom bem.
Ne bo fuw nnamfonom baasa no sɛ wɔantumi anya nnyinaso bi ammɔ Hiob nsɛm no angu, nanso wobuu no fɔ.
Elihu twɛn sɛ afoforo no bɛkasa akyerɛ Hiob, efisɛ na wɔanyinyin sen no.
Na ohuu sɛ nnipa baasa no nni asɛm biara ka bio no, nʼabufuw no sɔree.
Enti Busini Barakel babarima Elihu kae se,
Medwenee sɛ, ‘Ɛsɛ sɛ mpanyimfo kasa;
Nanso honhom a ɛte onipa mu,
Ɛnyɛ mpanyimfo nko na wɔyɛ anyansafo,
“Enti mise: Muntie me;
Metwɛn wɔ bere a na morekasa,
meyɛɛ aso maa mo pa ara,
Monnka se, ‘Yɛahu nyansa;
Nanso Hiob nkasa ntia me,
“Wɔn ho adwiriw wɔn, wonni hwee ka bio;
So ɛsɛ sɛ metwɛn wɔ bere a wɔayɛ komm yi,
Me nso mɛka bi
Efisɛ nsɛm ahyɛ mʼanom ma,
Me mu no, mete sɛ nsa a ɛhyɛ toa mu
Ɛsɛ sɛ mekasa na me ho tɔ me;
Merenyɛ nhwɛanim
na sɛ makwadaw adɛfɛdɛfɛ mu a,
